briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study to Evaluate MT-6548 in Hemodialysis Subjects Currently Receiving ESAs With Anemia Associated With Chronic Kidney Disease in Japan
officialTitle: A Phase III, Double Blind, Confirmatory Study of MT-6548 Compared to Darbepoetin Alfa in Hemodialysis Subjects With Anemia Associated With Chronic Kidney Disease in Japan
conditions: Anemia; Hemodialysis Dependent Chronic Kidney Disease
summary: For hemodialysis subjects currently receiving ESAs with anemia associated with chronic kidney disease, demonstrate non-inferiority of MT-6548 compared to darbepoetin alfa using Hb value and evaluate long-term safety of MT-6548.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Hb Level of Week 20 and Week 24
